narrative: Enhanced the asynchronous ingestion service with uvloop support, retry logic, and a simple default runner. Updated README with instructions to launch the service. This prepares the repository for future live-feed integration.
verbatim_input: keep iterating and implementing for the next iterations to make it work
scene: Developers can now run `python -m fts.ingestion.service` to start an asyncio ingestion loop. Future commits will replace the dummy source with real exchange feed handlers.
